name: Will forsyth
description: An experienced Front end developer. Strong knowledge of HTML/CSS/JS, graceful degradation and progressive enhancement. Familiar with NPM, git, and build systems. Experience with React and Meteor. Large Experience with UX taking large sites from concept to hand over to designers ( Wireframes, sitemaps, IA, and research. ). Ability to work within multidisciplinary teams with visual designers, motion designers and developers; Quickly prototype concepts to demonstrate and test ideas.
